sentences.sContent: Some investigators regarded her as the brains of the gang.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some investigators regarded her as the brains of the gang.
sentences.sCn: 一些调查人员认为她是团伙的决策者。

sentences.sContent: The language angel hanged up the gang and banged them at the angle of the triangle.
sentences.sContent_eng: The language angel hanged up the gang and banged them at the angle of the triangle.
sentences.sCn: 语言天使举起了一伙人并把他们猛撞到三角形的一个角上。

trans.tranOther: a group of criminals who work together
